title: Boubyan Mobile Banking
description: Boubyan Mobile Banking allows  customers to access and manage their accounts from Android mobile devices, anytime, anywhere. They can check balances, pay bills, manage cards, transfer money between accounts, and much more.In line with Boubyan Bank’s pledge to provide the best banking services to our customers, we are proud to announce a new major release of our Mobile Banking application for Android:-  Exquisite look and feel.-  Enhanced user experience.-  Major upgrade in functionality.-  Improved security and stability.To log on to the new Mobile Banking, please use the same user ID and password as Internet Banking. Our customer service team would be happy to assist if needed, we may reached 24x7 on 1 82 00 82
descriptionHTML:
Boubyan Mobile Banking allows customers to access and manage their accounts from Android mobile devices, anytime, anywhere. They can check balances, pay bills, manage cards, transfer money between accounts, and much more.

In line with Boubyan Bank’s pledge to provide the best banking services to our customers, we are proud to announce a new major release of our Mobile Banking application for Android:
-  Exquisite look and feel.
-  Enhanced user experience.
-  Major upgrade in functionality.
-  Improved security and stability.

To log on to the new Mobile Banking, please use the same user ID and password as Internet Banking. Our customer service team would be happy to assist if needed, we may reached 24x7 on 1 82 00 82
comments: Great app. One of the best if not the best bank in Kuwait. Great services and offers and great features in the app and overall in cards. Amazing bank with an amazing app. I would give it 5 stars if it supported new 18:9 screens.
بعض المرات البرنامج يسمح كل البيانات من نفسه و لازم من الاول احط البصمة و هاللوية كلها، غير جذي البرنامج 👍🏻
لا يمكنني فتح التطبيق لأنه تظهر لي رسالة انه لا يوجد اتصال في النت
recentChanges: General enhancements and completely new features:
- A one-step login process to minimize the login steps by removing the question/answer step for linked devices.
- Boubyan Locator now includes branches, ATMs, ATMs for special needs customers, ATMs for card issuance, and Boubyan Direct machines.
- Links for Pay Me service can be shared via other mobile applications.
- More details of the Finance Account.
